snippet: A defense team emerged after thousands of lawyers refused to represent the suspects because of what they called the “heinous” nature of the Dec. 16 gang rape of a young woman, who later died from her injuries.
abstract: A defense team emerged after thousands of lawyers refused to represent the suspects because of what they called the “heinous” nature of the Dec. 16 gang rape of a young woman, who later died from her injuries.

byline.original: By NIHARIKA MANDHANA and ANJANI TRIVEDI

headline.main: Three Accused in Delhi Gang Rape Case to Plead Not Guilty
headline.print_headline: Lawyers in India Step Up to Represent Accused in Rape Case
